channel.title: biking on Cottenie Lab
channel.description: Recent content in biking on Cottenie Lab

item.title: Bike Lessons
item.description: I am Ingrid, a returning member of the Cottenie lab. This is my first post, and it comes at one of those in-between times in my life. I am in between finishing a two-month bike tour and starting a three- (or four, or more…?) year PhD. It’s been an interesting process, returning from the tour and re-integrating back into society. First, a little about the tour. It was one of the best and most challenging things I have ever done.
